# Draft:Chris King Precision Components

in Santa Barbara, California, U.S.

}}
Chris King Precision Components is a bicycle component manufacturer located in Portland, Oregon. Chris King Precision Components is known for its headsets (bicycle part) and hubs.
Chris King Precision Components was started by Chris King in Santa Barbara, California. The company was formed in 1976. In 2000 the company moved to Redding, California before finally settling down in Portland.
Chris King Precision Components holds 8 patents.  Most recently Chris King Precision Components was awarded a patent for their internally routed design used in their aero headsets.
